channel.title: Can Duckduckgo snoop ALL traffic?
channel.description:
This is a question in general:
If duckduckgo is the search engine in the browser by default, if one types in abc dot com , does it send to duckduckgo "abc" before you hit enter or go to the site?
In other words, does duckduckgo get to see all DNS queries just because they share the address bar with search?

item.title: Can Duckduckgo snoop ALL traffic?
item.dc:creator: bliss
item.description:
So that’s a yes? They can see the traffic?
And there’s no way to not have any search engine?

Read full topic

item.title: Can Duckduckgo snoop ALL traffic?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Same as Tor Browser outside of Whonix.

Can be resolved as per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle.

Read full topic
